short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily place assets from your Aprimo DAM onto websites and emails

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aprimo QuickConnect brings the power of Aprimo’s Digital Asset Management (DAM) directly to your browser, allowing seamless access to approved digital assets without leaving your workflow. 

With powerful search features, dynamic asset customization, and easy integrations with your preferred marketing and CMS platforms, Aprimo QuickConnect ensures that your team is always equipped with the most up-to-date content.  

Increase productivity, maintain brand consistency, and streamline content operations with just a few clicks. 

Key Features: 

• Instant Access – Quickly access your Aprimo assets from within Chrome or Edge, eliminating the need to switch between platforms. 
• Advanced Search & Filtering – Use powerful search facets and filters to locate the right approved assets fast. 
• Dynamic Asset Customization – Easily crop, trim, and filter assets for optimized use in various channels. 
• Improve Page Load Times, SEO & Content Updates – Push out new content quickly and serve optimized assets to improve website performance, SEO, and user experience. 
• Performance Tracking – Track content performance with embedded analytics to understand how assets are being used and their impact. 

Get Started: 

1. Install the Aprimo QuickConnect extension on your Chrome or Edge browser. 
2. Enter the URL of your Aprimo DAM environment. 
3. Log into your account to access approved asset library directly from the browser. 
 

How to use Aprimo QuickConnect: 

• Use the advanced search and filtering options to locate the perfect asset for your campaign or content needs. 
• Modify assets to ensure optimal performance and appearance for specific channels. 
• Add tracking codes to monitor performance and gain insights into how and where your content is used. 
• Copy and paste the asset link directly into your web-based CMS, email campaigns, or any marketing platform. 

 

Why Choose Aprimo QuickConnect: 

• Version Control Simplified: When an asset is updated in Aprimo DAM, changes instantly reflect everywhere the link is used, ensuring consistency.  
• Boost Productivity: Eliminate the hassle of switching platforms by accessing Aprimo assets directly in your browser. 
• Maintain Consistency: Ensure brand integrity by always using up-to-date and approved assets. 
• Reduce Content Fragmentation: Eliminate content silos by centralizing all your assets in one place, ensuring consistent use across campaigns. 
• Seamless Integration: Work effortlessly across your marketing ecosystem, from CMS to emails. 

Get Started: 
Install Aprimo QuickConnect today and streamline your content workflows across teams and channels, enabling your team to deliver impactful, on-brand experiences faster than ever.
